entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 04 February 2023
